attributes.action: Raise awareness of bullying experienced by young people of both genders!
attributes.additional_details: Is it strange to find a petition from a young person on such a topic?well no it is not strange,I am 15years old and have already turned to suicide to stop the pain,but luckily I managed to survive,at the time i hated the thought of being saved but now every day I reflect on that one moment and I am seriously glad I experienced it because it made me realise,what young people do to other young people is absolutely unexplainable and disgusting!Bullying leaves scars that can never be removed!
attributes.background: It is time to find the catalyst of this issue,why are so many young people being attacked in such manners?wether it's verbally or physically,it is disgusting how so many young people have been left scared for life or there is even more severe cases that have ended in unfortunate suicide deaths!

rejection.details:
We think you might want similar action to this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/147226
